programme.title: Sweethearts
programme.desc: Two college freshmen break up with their high school sweethearts during one chaotic night before Thanksgiving. programme.title: A Sacrifice
programme.desc: US social psychologist Ben Monroe investigates a local cult connected to an unnerving event, while his daughter becomes mixed up with an enigmatic local boy. programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview: May 2025
programme.desc: A look ahead to the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Hypnotic
programme.sub-title: Mystery, Thriller, Drama, Action, Sci Fi ║ 2023 ║ 15
programme.desc: Police detective Danny Rourke is haunted by the abduction of his seven-year-old daughter Minnie from a park. During a bank heist, Danny discovers a photo of his daughter with an instruction to find someone called Dell Rayne. Evidence leads to a psychic Diana Cruz, who introduces the cop to the unseen world of hypnotics - people with the ability to control how we perceive the world. Action thriller, starring Ben Affleck, Alice Braga, William Fichtner and JD Pardo Robert Rodriguez - Director Ben Affleck - Danny Rourke Alice Braga - Diana Cruz J D Pardo - Nicks Hala Finley - Minnie (10 yo) Dayo Okeniyi - River Jeff Fahey - Carl Zane Holtz - Trout Ruben Javier Caballero - Watkins Jackie Earle Haley - Jeremiah William Fichtner - Dellrayne.

programme.title: The American Society of Magical Negroes
programme.desc: Satirical fantasy comedy starring Justice Smith and David Alan Grier. Genial artist Aren, who is African-American, is struggling to make sense of his place in the world until he's invited to join a secret society dedicated to enhancing the lives of white people. However, Aren's debut mission tests his loyalty when he and his first assignment fall for the same person Kobi Libii - Director Justice Smith - Aren David Alan Grier - Roger An-Li Bogan - Lizzie Drew Tarver - Jason Munt Aisha Hinds - Gabbard.

programme.title: Arthur's Whisky
programme.desc: When Joan's husband dies, she discovers he'd invented an anti-aging elixir that literally takes the years off. Sharing it with her friends Linda and Susan, the rejuvenated women waste little time in painting the town red, but they soon realise it's a very different world to the one they remember. programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: High school outcasts Janis Sarkisian and Damian Hubbard narrate the tale of 15-year-old Cady Heron, who moves back to America from Kenya with her mother. Janis encourages Cady to infiltrate the Plastics, ruled by the formidable Regina George, but when she does, the clique soon corrupts the new girl. programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.sub-title: Action, Family, Drama, Animation, Comedy, Fantasy, Children's, Sci Fi ║ 2024 ║ PG
programme.desc: Harold and pals Moose and Porcupine live in a hand-drawn world of limitless possibilities. The trio become concerned when the Old Man, who narrates their illustrated existence, suddenly falls silent. Using his magical crayon, Harold draws a door to the real world and tumbles into the present day as a flesh-and-blood man, who collides head-on with widow Terry and her young son, Mel. programme.title: Blue Beetle
programme.sub-title: Fantasy, Drama, Sci Fi, Action, Thriller ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: An ancient relic of alien biotechnology known as the Scarab chooses college graduate Jaime Reyes as its symbiotic host. programme.title: Please Don't Destroy: The Treasure of Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Directionless twenty something Ben Patterson lives with pals John and Martin. All three work at the Trout Plus outdoor goods emporium run by Ben's overbearing father, Farley. A random social media post intimates that an old compass, which Ben, John and Martin found as children, could be the missing link to discovering a bust of Marie Antoinette worth an estimated 100million US dollars. Ben resolves to earn his father's respect by unearthing the booty. programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: An apparently unassuming man finds someone very important to him has been scammed and driven to harm. programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: Eleanor is a talented but troubled young rookie detective wrestling with the demons of her past, when she is called to the scene of a brutal mass shooting - the work of a new and terrifying murderer. The police and FBI launch a nationwide manhunt, but are thwarted at every turn by the killer's enigmatic, and unprecedented behaviour. Despite her lack of experience, Eleanor is drawn deeper into the case as she, and her newfound mentor, realise that she may be the only person, given her own tortured psyche, who can understand the mind of this singular killer. programme.title: The Cinema List: Spectacular Sci-Fi
programme.desc: Reach beyond the stars and discover new worlds as we take a spectacular journey through some of our favourite sci-fi movies, from Blade Runner to Star Trek V: The Final Frontier.

programme.title: Silent Running
programme.desc: Sci-fi drama starring Bruce Dern. In a future 21st century, space freighters containing huge biodomes are launched to preserve the last of Earth's forests. On the vessel Valley Forge, botanist Freeman Lowell devotes all his energies to tending the precious flora. However, when the crew is ordered to destroy its cargo and return home, Lowell is forced to take desperate measures Douglas Trumbull - Director Bruce Dern - Freeman Lowell Cliff Potts - Wolf Ron Rifkin - Barker Jesse Vint - Keenan Mark Persons - Drone Steven Brown - Drone Cheryl Sparks - Drone Larry Whisenhunt - Drone.

programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: Disaster thriller starring Lee Byung-hun. After a devastating earthquake flattens buildings as far as the eye can see, Hwang Gung Apartments is the only tower block left standing in Seoul. Seeking refuge, survivors begin to pour in from the outside - but as the numbers increase, Hwang Gung residents feel the pressure and start taking drastic measures to safeguard their future Eom Tae-hwa - Director Lee Byung-hun - Yeong-tak Park Seo-joon - Min-sung Park Bo-young - Myung-hwa Kim Sun-young - Keum-ae Park Ji-hu - Hye-won.

programme.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock

Barely surviving the wrath of Khan, the battle-scarred starship Enterprise limps back to Earth, saved only by the sacrifice of the late Captain Spock. programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy and DeForest Kelley. In the 23rd century, Captain Kirk and his intrepid band of space travellers discover a probe in the vicinity of Earth that is trying to contact a humpback whale, a species that is extinct. programme.desc: An Indian student in London confronts western values and cultural loss. His journey bridges tradition and modernity, reminding us of identity, patriotism, and the strength of roots.

programme.title: Kranti
programme.desc: Sanga, a loyal worker for Raja Laxman Singh, is wrongfully accused of his murder. After escaping prison, he rallies revolutionaries to fight against British rule in India.

programme.title: Hum Aapke Hain Kaun
programme.desc: (Movies @6) Upon the death of her sister, Nisha's wedding is fixed with brother-in-law Rajesh. But Nisha and Prem, Rajesh's brother are in love.

programme.title: Radhe : Your Most Wanted Bhai
programme.desc: In Mumbai, a drug kingpin wreaks havoc, and the police are struggling. Enter Radhe, a specialist cop tasked with restoring order and peace to the city. Can he succeed?

programme.title: Yeh Vaada Raha
programme.desc: A man's mother opposes his relationship with a poor girl. En route to the temple to get married, they meet with an accident.

programme.title: Deewana Mastana
programme.desc: Chaos ensues when a small time crook and a mental patient tries to win heart of a beautiful woman with comical outcomes.

programme.title: Unchai
programme.desc: Three retired friends go on a trek to the Everest Base Camp to fulfill their dying friend's last wish. What starts as an adventure soon turns into a personal journey of emotional enlightenment.

programme.title: Bhaiaji Superhit
programme.desc: A don with dreams of acting dives into Bollywood chaos. Between action, comedy, and romance, his wild journey to stardom turns the film industry upside down in the quirkiest way.

programme.title: Teri Bhabhi Hai Pagle
programme.desc: Dev, an assistant director, dreams of independently directing a film and manages to convince Raj, a superstar, to produce his film. However, chaos ensues as the shooting commences.

programme.title: Saand Ki Aankh
programme.desc: Chandro and Prakashi, who are in their 60s, accidentally discover their shooting skills. With the help of an instructor, they compete in competitions.

programme.title: Baaghi: Rebels In Love
programme.desc: (Movies @6) Dhanushkodi has pledged to kill Santosh. So his father sends him away and hires Murthy to masquerade as Santosh. Murthy is in love with Santosh's cousin and hence willing to risk his life.

programme.title: Bareilly Ki Barfi
programme.desc: In Bareilly, free-spirited Bitti defies marriage pressures until her life changes when she meets Chirag and Pritam, sparking unexpected adventures and romance.

programme.title: Chhatriwali
programme.desc: Movie revolves around Sanya, a chemistry genius who decides to use her skills to educate the youth on safe sex and bring about a much-needed social change while looking for a job.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Check out a fun roundup of the hottest Bollywood tracks that everyone is buzzing about! Discover the tunes that are making waves in the music scene.

programme.title: Roop Ki Rani Choron Ka Raja
programme.desc: Two orphaned children grow up to take revenge on their parents' killer, who is now a reformed and respectable citizen.

programme.title: Main Prem Ki Diwani Hoon
programme.desc: A girl breaks free from the confines of an arranged marriage, choosing to embrace life on her own terms and live passionately, discovering her true self along the way.

programme.title: Saheb Biwi Aur Gangster 3
programme.desc: A tale of betrayal, power, and passion unfolds as old enemies clash and new alliances form in a royal household riddled with secrets, ambition, and dangerously entangled love affairs.

programme.title: Loveyatri - A Journey Of Love

programme.title: Janhit Mein Jaari

programme.desc: The San Francisco 49ers and the Detroit Lions advance to the NFC Championship game with a Super Bowl LVIII bid on the line. Can the Lions keep their storybook season going here? (28.01).

programme.title: NFL Highlights
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights as the Las Vegas Raiders and the Pittsburgh Steelers meet in week three of the 2023 NFL at Allegiant Stadium. (24.09).

programme.title: Men's State Of Origin 24 #1
programme.desc: The men's State of Origin series begins at Accor Stadium as the Maroons bring back-to-back series wins into the 2024 edition with the Blues looking for payback under a new coach. (05.06).

programme.title: Men's State Of Origin 24 #2
programme.desc: The men's State of Origin series makes its highly anticipated return to Melbourne for game two at the MCG, as the Blues hope to bounce back from defeat to the Maroons in the opener. (26.06).

programme.title: Men's State Of Origin 24 #3
programme.desc: A sold-out Suncorp Stadium is the venue for the deciding game of the 2024 men's State of Origin Series as the Maroons, who target a third straight series win, face the Blues. (17.07).

programme.title: Darts Gold: PL Final 2013
programme.desc: Michael van Gerwen faces Phil Taylor in the 2013 Premier League Darts final at the O2. The Dutchman saw off James Wade in the semi-finals, while Taylor took down Raymond van Barneveld.

programme.title: Darts Gold: PL Final 2010
programme.desc: Relive the final of the 2010 Premier League Darts between Phil Taylor and James Wade. 'The Power' made history en route to lifting the trophy for the fifth time.

programme.title: Darts Gold: Taylor v Priestley
programme.desc: A chance to relive some classic darts matches. Here is Phil Taylor against Dennis Priestley in the second round of the 2005 World Matchplay.

programme.title: Fight Night Int:Navarrete v Wilson
programme.desc: Emanuel Navarrete faces Liam Wilson for the vacant WBO world junior lightweight championship. Navarrete is looking to become a three-weight world champion with a win. (03.02).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Alimkhanuly v Gualtieri
programme.desc: For the unified middleweight championship of the world, Janibek Alimkhanuly of Kazakhstan fights Germany's Vincenzo Gualtieri in Rosenberg, Texas. (14.10).

programme.title: Fight Night Int:Anderson v Rudenko
programme.desc: Ten rounds of heavyweight boxing await, as an undefeated Jared Anderson makes his way to the ring to face Andriy Rudenko in Tulsa, Oklahoma. (27.08).

programme.title: Fight Night Int:Barboza v Zorrilla
programme.desc: The main event spotlight shines upon Arnold Barboza Jr and Danielito Zorrilla as the two unbeaten super-lightweights enter the squared circle for ten rounds of boxing. (16.07).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Haney v Kambosos
programme.desc: Undisputed lightweight champion Devin Haney and George Kambosos meet in their rematch in Melbourne. After Haney's dominant win in the first fight, will it be repeat or revenge? (16.10).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Berlanga v Angulo
programme.desc: Super middleweight power puncher Edgar Berlanga puts his 19-0 record on the line against former world title challenger Roamer Alexis Angulo in Connecticut.

programme.title: Fight Night Int:Berlanga v Rolls
programme.desc: Rising super middleweight star Edgar Berlanga takes on Steve Rolls at the Hulu Theatre in Madison Square Garden. Rolls' sole defeat came to Gennady Golovkin.

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Navarrete v Baez
programme.desc: Emanuel Navarrete looks to extend his winning streak of 30 consecutive bouts as he defends his WBO featherweight crown against fellow Mexican Eduardo Baez in San Diego. (21.08).

programme.title: Fight Night Int:Navarrete v Valdez
programme.desc: Glendale's Desert Diamond Arena sets the scene for an all-Mexican title bout, as Emanuel Navarrete defends his WBO junior lightweight championship against Oscar Valdez. (12.08).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Kambosos v Hughes
programme.desc: Oklahoma's FireLake Arena welcomes George Kambosos Jr and Britain's Maxi Hughes to the ring, as the pair butt heads in a lightweight world title eliminator. (22.07).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Pedraza v Commey
programme.desc: A super lightweight fight between two of the division's main contenders as technician Jose Pedraza faces power puncher Richard Commey in Tulsa. (28.08).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Ramirez v Pedraza
programme.desc: After losing his undisputed super lightweight showdown to Josh Taylor, José Ramírez looks to bounce back with a statement win over former two-weight world champ José Pedraza.

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Loma v Nakatani
programme.desc: Vasiliy Lomachenko tries to get back in world title contention as he fights lightweight contender Masayoshi Nakatani in Las Vegas. Loma comes here following defeat to Teofimo Lopez.

programme.desc: Castleford and Wakefield bring Magic Weekend at St James' Park to a close. Castleford secured their second win of the campaign with a five-try haul over Huddersfield Giants last week.

programme.title: S/Lge 24
programme.desc: In the Betfred Super League, Hull FC host Hull KR at the MKM Stadium during round one. This season, Hull FC are looking to emulate the Robins who enjoyed a successful 2023 campaign. (15.02).

programme.title: S/Lge 24
programme.desc: Hull KR play host to Leeds Rhinos in the Betfred Super League. Two tries from Ash Handley got Leeds over the line in their opener, while the Robins stormed to victory over Hull FC. (22.02).

programme.title: S/Lge 24
programme.desc: In the Betfred Super League, Leeds Rhinos clash with Steve McNamara's Catalans Dragons, whose 0-34 victory over London Broncos last week produced four different try-scorers (02.03).

programme.title: S/Lge 24
programme.desc: In the Betfred Super League, St Helens face Leigh Leopards. 28 unanswered points saw St Helens come away from Huddersfield with back-to-back victories to start the season. (01.03).

programme.title: S/Lge 24
programme.desc: Hull KR host Warrington Wolves in the Betfred Super League. Previously, Hull were denied three from three in defeat at Salford, while Sam Burgess' side secured back to back wins. (07.03).

programme.title: S/Lge 24
programme.desc: Leigh Leopards host Leeds Rhinos in the Betfred Super League. Two from two on home turf, Leeds are hoping to replicate that same form on the road at Leigh Sports Village here. (08.03).

programme.title: Tri-Nations Rugby: AUS v SA
programme.desc: The opening round of the 2024 Rugby Championship as Joe Schmidt's Australia host Rassie Erasmus' reigning world champions South Africa at Suncorp Stadium in Brisbane. (10.08).

programme.title: Tri-Nations Rugby: NZ v ARG
programme.desc: Round one of the 2024 Rugby Championship as Scott Robertson's New Zealand, who are winners of the last four Rugby Championships, host Felipe Contepomi's Argentina side. (10.08).

programme.title: Tri-Nations Rugby: AUS v SA
programme.desc: The Wallabies and the Springboks meet during the second round of the Rugby Championship at Perth's Optus Stadium. The world champion Springboks outclassed Australia in the opener. (17.08).

programme.title: NFL Highlights
programme.desc: In an NFC divisional round matchup, the Detroit Lions host the Tampa Bay Buccaneers. The last time the Lions won multiple playoff games dates back to their 1957 championship run. (21.01).

programme.title: Tri-Nations Rugby: SA v NZ
programme.desc: The 2024 Rugby Championship continues with a third-round match-up between the reigning world champions South Africa and the All Blacks - a rematch of the 2023 World Cup final. (31.08).

programme.title: NFL Highlights
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights as the Green Bay Packers are faced with an eliminated divisional rival, the Chicago Bears, at home during the final week of the NFL regular season. (07.01).

programme.title: NFL Highlights
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights, as the Pittsburgh Steelers host the Cleveland Browns at Acrisure Stadium in week two of the 2023 NFL season. (18.09).

programme.title: NFL Highlights
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights, as the Carolina Panthers host Derek Carr's 1-0 New Orleans Saints at the Bank of America Stadium in week two of the 2023 NFL season. (18.09).

programme.title: NFL Highlights
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights from the New England Patriots' meeting with AFC East rivals the Miami Dolphins at the Gillette Stadium in week two of the 2023 NFL. (17.09).

programme.title: Tri-Nations Rugby: SA v NZ
programme.desc: A week on from the Springboks triumphing in a thrilling comeback against the All Blacks, South Africa face New Zealand once more in the fourth round of the 2024 Rugby Championship. (07.09).

programme.title: NFL Highlights
programme.desc: The Super Bowl champions Kansas City Chiefs head to the Buffalo Bills for an AFC divisional round matchup. The Chiefs' Patrick Mahomes stars in his first playoff game on the road. (21.01).

programme.title: NFL Highlights
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights from a match-up in week two of the 2023 NFL season, as the Dallas Cowboys host the New York Jets at AT&T Stadium. (17.09).

programme.title: NFL Highlights
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights as the 0-2 Cincinnati Bengals host the 1-1 Los Angeles Rams in week three of the 2023 NFL season. (25.09).

programme.title: NFL Highlights
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights as the Tampa Bay Buccaneers host the Philadelphia Eagles in week three of the 2023 NFL season. The Eagles return to action with a 2-0 record. (25.09).

programme.title: NFL Highlights
programme.desc: The San Francisco 49ers and the Detroit Lions advance to the NFC Championship game with a Super Bowl LVIII bid on the line. Can the Lions keep their storybook season going here? (28.01).

programme.title: NFL Highlights
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights as the Las Vegas Raiders and the Pittsburgh Steelers meet in week three of the 2023 NFL at Allegiant Stadium. (24.09).

programme.title: Men's State Of Origin 24 #1
programme.desc: The men's State of Origin series begins at Accor Stadium as the Maroons bring back-to-back series wins into the 2024 edition with the Blues looking for payback under a new coach. (05.06).

programme.title: Men's State Of Origin 24 #2
programme.desc: The men's State of Origin series makes its highly anticipated return to Melbourne for game two at the MCG, as the Blues hope to bounce back from defeat to the Maroons in the opener. (26.06).

programme.title: Men's State Of Origin 24 #3
programme.desc: A sold-out Suncorp Stadium is the venue for the deciding game of the 2024 men's State of Origin Series as the Maroons, who target a third straight series win, face the Blues. (17.07).

programme.title: Darts Gold: PL Final 2013
programme.desc: Michael van Gerwen faces Phil Taylor in the 2013 Premier League Darts final at the O2. The Dutchman saw off James Wade in the semi-finals, while Taylor took down Raymond van Barneveld.

programme.title: Darts Gold: PL Final 2010
programme.desc: Relive the final of the 2010 Premier League Darts between Phil Taylor and James Wade. 'The Power' made history en route to lifting the trophy for the fifth time.

programme.title: Darts Gold: Taylor v Priestley
programme.desc: A chance to relive some classic darts matches. Here is Phil Taylor against Dennis Priestley in the second round of the 2005 World Matchplay.

programme.title: Fight Night Int:Navarrete v Wilson
programme.desc: Emanuel Navarrete faces Liam Wilson for the vacant WBO world junior lightweight championship. Navarrete is looking to become a three-weight world champion with a win. (03.02).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Alimkhanuly v Gualtieri
programme.desc: For the unified middleweight championship of the world, Janibek Alimkhanuly of Kazakhstan fights Germany's Vincenzo Gualtieri in Rosenberg, Texas. (14.10).

programme.title: Fight Night Int:Anderson v Rudenko
programme.desc: Ten rounds of heavyweight boxing await, as an undefeated Jared Anderson makes his way to the ring to face Andriy Rudenko in Tulsa, Oklahoma. (27.08).

programme.title: Fight Night Int:Barboza v Zorrilla
programme.desc: The main event spotlight shines upon Arnold Barboza Jr and Danielito Zorrilla as the two unbeaten super-lightweights enter the squared circle for ten rounds of boxing. (16.07).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Haney v Kambosos
programme.desc: Undisputed lightweight champion Devin Haney and George Kambosos meet in their rematch in Melbourne. After Haney's dominant win in the first fight, will it be repeat or revenge? (16.10).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Berlanga v Angulo
programme.desc: Super middleweight power puncher Edgar Berlanga puts his 19-0 record on the line against former world title challenger Roamer Alexis Angulo in Connecticut.

programme.title: Fight Night Int:Berlanga v Rolls
programme.desc: Rising super middleweight star Edgar Berlanga takes on Steve Rolls at the Hulu Theatre in Madison Square Garden. Rolls' sole defeat came to Gennady Golovkin.

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Navarrete v Baez
programme.desc: Emanuel Navarrete looks to extend his winning streak of 30 consecutive bouts as he defends his WBO featherweight crown against fellow Mexican Eduardo Baez in San Diego. (21.08).

programme.title: Fight Night Int:Navarrete v Valdez
programme.desc: Glendale's Desert Diamond Arena sets the scene for an all-Mexican title bout, as Emanuel Navarrete defends his WBO junior lightweight championship against Oscar Valdez. (12.08).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Kambosos v Hughes
programme.desc: Oklahoma's FireLake Arena welcomes George Kambosos Jr and Britain's Maxi Hughes to the ring, as the pair butt heads in a lightweight world title eliminator. (22.07).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Pedraza v Commey
programme.desc: A super lightweight fight between two of the division's main contenders as technician Jose Pedraza faces power puncher Richard Commey in Tulsa. (28.08).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Ramirez v Pedraza
programme.desc: After losing his undisputed super lightweight showdown to Josh Taylor, José Ramírez looks to bounce back with a statement win over former two-weight world champ José Pedraza.

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Loma v Nakatani
programme.desc: Vasiliy Lomachenko tries to get back in world title contention as he fights lightweight contender Masayoshi Nakatani in Las Vegas. Loma comes here following defeat to Teofimo Lopez.
